title: So... I bought Azir...
body:
I bought Azir today and then left home to take care of some personal stuff. I was so tired when I got home. All I wanted to do was relieve my stress by playing the new champ... "Azir is disabled due to a bug"...

LIK DIS IF U CRI EVERTIM ;(

replies.body: Surprised they didn't leave him up for the one gamemode that doesn't have turrets.
lol
Yeah tbh, I don't know why he has that ability because it doesn't tie into Ascension.

Because he could turn the dead xerath ascendant into a turret.  In other words the ascendant xerath is a re-skinned turret.

He's still not supposed to be able to do it though.
we may never get to play as ascended azir :(
They will extend ascension if he is not fixed soon i'm sure. The ascension game mode was about azir and the new lore they will extend it if they have to.
I got to play ascended Azir.

I'm still mad, its been like 7 hours so far, and I paid money for this.  Riot has a great game, but I'm really getting tired of all the rolling updates, servers timeouts, and champion bugs (within hours of being released).  I love the game, but these issues are making the game hard to play a lot of the time....
Also all the buildup to a new champ that doesn't work is kinda annoying :/

The coding for PBE and the live servers, are different. There is probably like a line of code in a billion, that they need to fix. Just give them some time.
he is fixed, but I wasn't in a hurry, I have patience, though that baron solo...still...just....wow...
omfg
Yeeah i want that!!!! jk i know i know...
riot wtf....lets go already

I'm not crying, I'm about to go out in the streets and eat somebody out of sheer rage.

I waited for three weeks to play with this guy. Having him go unavaiable in the first day is so godamn fustrating.

Specially since it will be a long while until I can actually play him, because you have exactly 5% chance of picking a new champion before anybody else does.

Hey guys, I just found this new way that gives you 100% chance to play Azir. All I ask is that you don't tell anyone about this unique game mode that allows you to skip pick order and channel in on the champion you want to play in the moment! It's called Team Builder and you click Play > PvP > Team Builder. You may have to wait a little longer than usual queues to play Azir, but at least you don't have to go through several games before 1) Azir isn't picked by a team mate or opponent, 2) you're first pick, and 3) Azir isn't banned.
It takes 24 minutes to find a godamn match for a mid laner, and another 24 because nobody is picking fucking support.

The answer is obvious........


SUPPORT {{champion:268}}  FTW!!!!


But on a serious note, using Azir to replace the ADC bot lane is actually pretty good. Played against it a few times, and while the early game isn't amazing (it's passable), the late game is. Just make sure someone else does the AD damage.

I'll consider trying that out sometime. I generally avoid ADC like the plague, but if GoldenManBird does well at it, maybe something can come out of it. I mean, he's not particularely mana hungry, as long as you last hit a lot with a Ring it should work...

I'm also interested on trying him Support. Though he seens to be somewhat Feast or Famine on that regard.
actually you have a 20% chance... unless it's 3's

I think the people who paid for him with RP only to not be able to play him should receive some sort of compensation... It's ridiculous. In the physical world if you bought something with real money, and it was defective to the point you couldn't use it the company you bought it from would definitely compensate you for your frustration and try to rekindle the relationship.
Customer service 101.

It would also be nice to get some sort of ETA, or updates on the issue.

Riots customer service seriously makes me want to **gag**, If I don't get some *compensation* for these wait times i'm going to be forced to **defecate** in my palm and **clap**.

It doesn't really affect me since I bought him with RP anyway... But wouldn't it be fair to refund the IP buyers the additional cost? You pay something like 1500 more for one week earlier access and then you disable him for a good part of it.

I mean, it is partially Riots fault. He was pretty much untested on any map but Ascension and even there it was kinda lacking. He was banned because of his ult damage bug and then the crashes caused by his Q range indicator started. He really would have needed another day or two of actual testing. You know, without Azir crashing too often to actually be played.
The coding for PBE and Live servers are different. So when they shifted it a line or so probably got mixed up. There was no way they could predict this, and they wouldnt do it on purpose.
